Study.StudyName: Columbia Suicid Severity Rating Scale Example
Study.ProtocolName: Protocol: Columbia Suicid Severity Rating Scale Example

WorkflowDef.Name: Workflow Columbia Suicid Severity Rating Scale questionnaire, part Suicidal Ideation

Description.TranslatedText: Workflow Columbia Suicid Severity Rating Scale questionnaire, section "Suicidal Ideation"

Transition.Name: Transition from 'Whish to be dead question' to branching for 'Non-Specific Active Suicidal Thoughts' question and 'If yes, describe' question

Branching.Name: Branching on conditional 'Non-Specific Active Suicidal Thoughts' question

Transition.Name: Transition to question 'Wish to be Dead - Description'
Default transition to question 'Non-Specific Active Suicidal Thoughts'
Transition from 'Wish to be Dead - Description' question to 'Non-Specific Active Suicidal Thoughts' question
Transition from 'Non-Specific Active Suicidal Thoughts' question to branching for 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Any Methods' question and If yes, describe' question

Branching.Name: Branching on conditional 'Non-Specific Active Suicidal Thoughts' question

Transition.Name: Transition to question 'Non-Specific Active Suicidal Thoughts - Description'
Non-Specific Active Suicidal Thoughts - Description' to next branching
Default transition to branching point where one one can get out of the current workflow

Branching.Name: Branching after question 2, different ways to leave the workflow for 'Suicidal Ideation'

Transition.Name: Transition after questions 1 and 2, to group 'Suicidal Behavior'
Transition after questions 1 and 2, to group 'Intensity of Ideation'
Transition after branching point after question 2 'Non-specific Active Suicidal Thoughts' to question 3 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Any Methods'
Transition from 'Non-Specific Active Suicidal Thoughts' to branching for 'Active suicidation with some intent to act' and 'If yes, describe' question

Branching.Name: Branching on conditional 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Any Methods' question

Transition.Name: Transition to question 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Any Methods - Description'
Transition from 'Active suicidal ideation with any methods' to 'Active suicidal ideation with some intent'
Transition from 'Active suicidal ideation with any methods - description' to 'Active suicidal ideation with some intent'
Transition from 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Some Intent to Act' to branching for 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Specific Plan and Intent' and 'If yes, describe' question

Branching.Name: Branching on conditional 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Some Intent to Act' question

Transition.Name: Transition to question 'Active suicidal ideation with some intent - description
Transition from 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Some Intent to Act - Description' to 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Specific Plan and Intent'
Deault transition from question 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Some Intent to Act' to question 'Active Suicidal Ideation with Specific Plan and Intent'
Transition from 'Active Suicidal Ideation with specific plan' to branching for 'Itensity of Ideation section' and 'If yes, describe'

Branching.Name: Branching on conditional 'Active suicidal ideation with some intent'

Transition.Name: Transition from branching to question 'Intensity of ideation'
Transition to question 'Active Suicidation with specific plan - description'
Transition from 'Active suicidal ideation with specific plan - descrition' to section ''Intensity of ideation

StudyEventDef.Name: Columbia Suicid Severity Rating Scale Visit

ItemGroupDef.Name: Actual suicide attempt with Lifetime additional checkbox
Interrupted attempt with Lifetime additional checkbox
Aborted attempt with Lifetime additional checkbox
Other preparatory acts to kill self with Lifetime additional Checkbox
Self-injury behavior with Lifetime additional Checkbox

Description.TranslatedText: Ask questions 1 and 2. If both are negative, proceed to "Suicidal Behavior" section. If the answer to question 2 is "yes", ask questions 3, 4 and 5. If the answer to question 1 and/or 2 is "yes", complete "Intensity of Ideation" section below.

ItemGroupDef.Name: 'Wish to be dead group', with 'If yes: describe'
'Wish to be dead group', repeating over 'Lifetime' and 'Past 1 month'
'Non-Specific Active Suicidal Thoughts' group, with 'If yes: describe'
'Non-Specific Active Suicidal Thoughts' group, repeating over 'Lifetime' and 'Past 1 month'
'Active Suicidal Ideation with Any Methods ...' group, with 'If yes: descripbe'
Active Suicidal Ideation with Any Methods ...' group, repeating over 'Lifetime' and 'Past 1 month'
'Active Suicidal Ideation with Some Intent to Act, ...', with 'If yes: describe'
'Active Suicidal Ideation with Some Intent to Act, ...', repeating over 'Lifetime' and 'Past 1 month'
'Active Suicidal Ideation with Specific Plan and Intent' group, with 'If yes: describe'
'Active Suicidal Ideation with Specific Plan and Intent' group, repeating over 'Lifetime' and 'Past 1 month'
Made a suicide attempt lifetime or 3 months
Done anything to harm yourself lifetime or 3 months
Done anything dangerous lifetime or 3 months
Number of attempts lifetime or 3 months
Non-Suicidal Self-injurous Behavior lifetime or 3 months

Description.TranslatedText: Potential Lethality: Only Answer if Actual Lethality=0

ItemDef.Name: Other preparatory acts to kill self

Question.TranslatedText: Other preparatory acts to kill self

ItemDef.Name: Suicidal thoughts with method (but without specific plan or intent to act)

Question.TranslatedText: Suicidal thoughts with method (but without specific plan or intent to act)

ItemDef.Name: Recent loss or other significant negative event

Question.TranslatedText: Recent loss or other significant negative event

ItemDef.Name: Recent loss or other significant negative event description
Perceived burden on family or others

Question.TranslatedText: Perceived burden on family or others
Chronic physical pain or other acute medical problem (AIDS, COPD, cancer, etc.)

ItemDef.Name: Method for suicide available (gun, pills, etc.)

Question.TranslatedText: Method for suicide available (gun, pills, etc.)

ItemDef.Name: Refuses or feels unable to agree to safety plan

Question.TranslatedText: Refuses or feels unable to agree to safety plan
Responsibility to family or others; living with family

ItemDef.Name: Fear of death or dying due to pain and suffering

Question.TranslatedText: Fear of death or dying due to pain and suffering

ItemDef.Name: Belief that suicide is immoral, high spirituality

Question.TranslatedText: Belief that suicide is immoral, high spirituality

ItemDef.Name: Any suicida self-injury or aggressive behavior

Question.TranslatedText: Describe any suicidal, self-injury or aggressive behavior (include dates):

Description.TranslatedText: Subject endorses thoughts about a wish to be dead or not alive anymore, or wish to fall asleep and not wake up.

Question.TranslatedText: Have you wished you were dead or wished you could go to sleep and not wake up?

Description.TranslatedText: General non-specific thoughts of wanting to end one’s life/commit suicide (e.g., “I’ve thought about killing myself”) without thoughts of ways to kill oneself/associated methods, intent, or plan during the assessment period.

Question.TranslatedText: Have you actually had any thoughts of killing yourself?

ItemDef.Name: 3. Active Suicidal Ideation with Any Methods (Not Plan) without Intent to Act

Description.TranslatedText: Subject endorses thoughts of suicide and has thought of at least one method during the assessment period. This is different than a specific plan with time, place or method details worked out (e.g., thought of method to kill self but not a specific plan). Includes person who would say, “I thought about taking an overdose but I never made a specific plan as to when, where or how I would actually do it…and I would never go through with it.”

Question.TranslatedText: Have you been thinking about how you might do this?

ItemDef.Name: 3. Active Suicidal Ideation with Any Methods (Not Plan) without Intent to Act - Description
4. Active Suicidal Ideation with Some Intent to Act, without Specific Plan

Description.TranslatedText: Active suicidal thoughts of killing oneself and subject reports having some intent to act on such thoughts, as opposed to 'I have the thoughts but I definitely will not do anything about them.'

Question.TranslatedText: Have you had these thoughts and had some intention of acting on them?

ItemDef.Name: 4. Active Suicidal Ideation with Some Intent to Act, without Specific Plan - Description
5. Active Suicidal Ideation with Specific Plan and Intent

Description.TranslatedText: Thoughts of killing oneself with details of plan fully or partially worked out and subject has some intent to carry it out.

Question.TranslatedText: Have you started to work out or worked out the details of how to kill yourself? Do you intend to carry out this plan?

ItemDef.Name: 5. Active Suicidal Ideation with Specific Plan and Intent - Description

Question.TranslatedText: How many times have you had these thoughts?
When you have the thoughts how long do they last?
Could/can you stop thinking about killing yourself or wanting to die if you want to?
Are there things - anyone or anything (e.g., family, religion, pain of death) - that stopped you from wanting to die or acting on thoughts of committing suicide?

What sort of reasons did you have for thinking about wanting to die or killing yourself? Was it to end the pain or stop the way you were feeling (in other words you couldn’t go on living with this pain or how you were feeling) or was it to get attention, revenge or a reaction from others? Or both?

ItemDef.Name: Have you made a suicide attempt

Question.TranslatedText: Have you made a suicide attempt?

ItemDef.Name: Have you done anything to harm yourself

Question.TranslatedText: Have you done anything to harm yourself?

ItemDef.Name: Have you done anything dangerous where you could have died

Question.TranslatedText: Have you done anything dangerous where you could have died?

ItemDef.Name: Did you xxx as a way to end your life

Question.TranslatedText: Did you xxx as a way to end your life?

ItemDef.Name: Did you want to die (even a little) when you xxx

Question.TranslatedText: Did you want to die (even a little) when you xxx?

ItemDef.Name: Were you trying to end your life when you xxx

Question.TranslatedText: Were you trying to end your life when you xxx?

ItemDef.Name: Or Did you think it was possible you could have died from xxx

Question.TranslatedText: Or Did you think it was possible you could have died from xxx?

ItemDef.Name: Or did you do it purely for other reasons

Question.TranslatedText: Or did you do it purely for other reasons / without ANY intention of killing yourself (like to relieve stress, feel better, get sympathy, or get something else to happen)??

ItemDef.Name: Way to end your life description
subject engaged in Non-Suicidal Self-Injurious Behavior

Question.TranslatedText: Has subject engaged in Non-Suicidal Self-Injurious Behavior?

ItemDef.Name: Time when you started to do something to end your life

Question.TranslatedText: Has there been a time when you started to do something to end your life but someone or something stopped you before you actually did anything?

ItemDef.Name: Description of Time when you started to do something to end your life

Question.TranslatedText: Has there been a time when you started to do something to try to end your life but you stopped yourself before you actually did anything?

ItemDef.Name: Steps towards making a suicide attempt

Question.TranslatedText: Have you taken any steps towards making a suicide attempt or preparing to kill yourself (such as collecting pills, getting a gun, giving valuables away or writing a suicide note)?

ItemDef.Name: Description of Steps towards making a suicide attempt
Total number of Steps towards making a suicide attempt

Decode.TranslatedText: Lifetime: Time He/She Felt Most Suicidal
Less than 1 hour/some of the time
Can control thoughts with little difficulty
Can control thoughts with some difficulty
Can control thoughts with a lot of difficulty
Does not attempt to control thoughts
Deterrents definitely stopped you from attempting suicide
Deterrents most likely did not stop you
Deterrents definitely did not stop you
Completely to get attention, revenge or a reaction from others
Mostly to get attention, revenge or a reaction from others
Equally to get attention, revenge or a reaction from others
Mostly to end or stop the pain (you couldn’t go on with the pain or how you were feeling)
Completely to end or stop the pain (you couldn’t go on living with the pain or how you were feeling)
No physical damage or very minor physical damage (e.g., surface scratches)
Minor physical damage (e.g., lethargic speech; first-degree burns; mild bleeding; sprains)
Moderate physical damage; medical attention needed (e.g., conscious but sleepy, somewhat responsive; second-degree burns; bleeding of major vessel)

Moderately severe physical damage; medical hospitalization and likely intensive care required (e.g., comatose with reflexes intact; third-degree burns less than 20% of body; extensive blood loss but can recover; major fractures)

Severe physical damage; medical hospitalization with intensive care required (e.g., comatose without reflexes; third-degree burns over 20% of body; extensive blood loss with unstable vital signs; major damage to a vital area)
Behavior not likely to result in injury
Behavior likely to result in injury but not likely to cause death
Behavior likely to result in death despite available medical care

ConditionDef.Name: Condition for moving to question 'Description of whishing to be dead'

Description.TranslatedText: If question 'Wish to be dead' is answered with 'Yes', go to question 'Description of wishing to be dead'

ConditionDef.Name: Condition for moving to page/section 'Suicidal Behavior' after questions 1 and 2 of 'Suicidal Iedation'

Description.TranslatedText: If both questions 1 and 2 of section 'Suicidal Ideation' are negative, proceed to section/page 'Suicidal behavior'

ConditionDef.Name: Condition for skipping the question 'If yes, describe', after question 'Or did you do it purely for other reasons / without ANY intention of killing yourself ...'

Description.TranslatedText: Do not collect when the question 'Or did you do it purely for other reasons / without ANY intention of killing yourself ...' was answered with "No"

ConditionDef.Name: Condition for skipping the question 'If yes, describe', after question 'Has there been a time when you started to do something to end your life but someone stopped you ...'

Description.TranslatedText: Do not collect when the question 'Has there been a time when you started to do something to end your life but someone or something stopped you ...' was answered with "No"

ConditionDef.Name: Condition for skipping the question 'If yes, describe', after question 'Has there been a time when you started to do something to try to end your life but you stopped yourself ...'

Description.TranslatedText: Do not collect when the question 'Has there been a time when you started to do something to try to end your life but you stopped yourself ...' was answered with "No"

ConditionDef.Name: Condition for skipping the question 'If yes, describe', after question 'Have you taken any steps towards making a suicide attempt or preparing to kill yourself ...'

Description.TranslatedText: Do not collect when the question 'Have you taken any steps towards making a suicide attempt or preparing to kill yourself ...' was answered with "No"

ConditionDef.Name: Condition for skipping question group 'Potential Lethality: Only Answer if Actual Lethality=0'

Description.TranslatedText: Do not collect when the collected value for the question 'Actual Lethality/Medical Damage' is 0
